properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 160259Z JUN BY
   M/V NPS SANCO STAR AND M/V OCEAN EUROPE TOWING
   300 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-17.98S 040-04.95W, 22-22.73S 039-55.12W,
   22-28.10S 039-58.90W, 22-23.62S 040-05.99W.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1183/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 160359Z JUN.
